scripts.release:draft: CHANGELOG=$(sed -n "/^## v$npm_package_version/,/^## /p" CHANGELOG.md | sed '1d;$d') && gh release create v$npm_package_version --draft --title v$npm_package_version --notes "$CHANGELOG"
scripts.git:push:all: CHANGELOG=$(sed -n "/^## v$npm_package_version/,/^## /p" CHANGELOG.md | sed '1d;$d') && git add . && git commit -m "$CHANGELOG" && git push -u origin main
scripts.git:push:all:reversed: CHANGELOG=$(sed -n "/^## v$npm_package_version/,/^## /p" CHANGELOG.md | sed '1d;$d' | tac) && git add . && git commit -m "$CHANGELOG" && git push -u origin main
scripts.git:push: CHANGELOG=$(sed -n "/^## \[UNRELEASED\]/ {n;p;q;}" CHANGELOG.md | sed '$!d') && git commit -m "$CHANGELOG" && git push -u origin main
scripts.cicd:reversed: yarn git:push:all:reversed && yarn release:draft && yarn release:publish
scripts.cicd: yarn git:push:all && yarn release:draft && yarn release:publish
scripts.release:old:private: CHANGELOG=$(sed -n "/^## v$npm_package_version/,/^## /p" CHANGELOG.md | sed '1d;$d') && gh release create v$npm_package_version --draft=false --title v$npm_package_version --notes "$CHANGELOG"
scripts.release:old:public: CHANGELOG=$(sed -n "/^## v$npm_package_version/,/^## /p" CHANGELOG.md | sed '1d;$d') && gh release create v$npm_package_version --draft=false --title v$npm_package_version --notes "$CHANGELOG" --repo PeterBlenessy/stoqster-releases
